popularityCurve.label: my philosophy for law enforcement is to have co-active policing which involves proactive police work with citizens involved in the problem-solving process

clusterList.phrase: my philosophy for law enforcement is to have co-active policing which involves proactive police work with citizens involved in the problem-solving process

there is no doubt that the police would incur unpopularity any further deterioration in the good relationship between police and public is to be deplored but it is difficult to see how this could be avoided
our colleagues who are in charge of proper law enforcement systems are here
it's a win-win situation for the community as well as law enforcement
police officers can be there in a minute
the police are not meant to be street-corner psychologists
we are a team and we are working together and helping to improve the police together

it is essential that we get back to the basics of policing to be seen on foot patrols in our towns and villages to get to know the local community and earn their trust and confidence and thereby allay their fears and concerns
